RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the patrol car: the United States Border Patrol's patrol car
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the pickup truck camper: Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck camper

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the United States Border Patrol's patrol: Vehicle used by agents Stanley Pruszenski and Alfred Baron for surveillance and inspection
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Maria De Jesus Garcia's pickup truck cam: Vehicle used to transport undocumented immigrants
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.the window of the patrol car: Location from which Baron observed suspicious activity
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.Baron's flashlight: Tool used to illuminate the interior of the pickup truck camper
